scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.clean-install: npm ci --prefix backend && npm ci --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run --prefix backend test && npm run --prefix frontend test
scripts.lint: npm run --prefix backend lint && npm run --prefix frontend lint
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
